subject: EQUITY INVESTMENT LIMITED.
body:
EQUITY INVESTMENT LIMITED.
TEL: +447452219067
FAX: +447452219060
Date: 03.02.2024
Dear  
The bank accounts we gave you are good.
Proceed and send the affidavit T21 fee so that the advocate will go to
the LONDON HIGH COURT then apply and pay for your affidavit  T21.
If you are not interested in your award prize kindly send cancellation letter.
I can see you are not serious.
Regards,
ERIC PAUL.

subject: Re:   EQUITY INVESTMENT LIMITED.
body:
Dear Eric Paul,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your message regarding the equity investment limited and the bank accounts you provided. Could you please provide me with more information about the affidavit fee? What is it for exactly, and how much is required?

I want to make sure I understand the process correctly before proceeding. Additionally, could you please clarify what award prize you are referring to? I'm sorry if there has been any confusion on my part.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kenneth
